FuncDef: The display access statistics trigger slot command displays user packet statistics by the board, including the number of packets sent to the main control board and the number of discarded packets.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays user packet statistics on the board in a specified slot.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the access trigger packet-limit command is run to configure a limit on the number of ARP/IP/IPv6/ND packets that can be sent to the main control board, you can run the display access statistics trigger command to check user packet statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
